recommendations: Archit Mittal “Nikhil sir is one of those persons whom you can trust in corporate world. He is man of words, always willing to help others. I believe he carries a bag of knowledge with himself. He has knowledge related to any random field. This makes him stand out of others. I know him since I interned at Small Bag Delivery under him.”

Yash Mahajan “I worked with Nikhil as a Marketing intern at Small Bag Delivery. He is an amazing mentor who was always supportive and helpful to me during my internship period. I really liked working under his leadership and the guidance he provided really helped me in understanding the Market Research domain and mapping the customer journey.”
